nameOverride.description: String to partially override ff-common.fullname template (will maintain the release name)

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override ff-common.fullname template

tag.description: Frank!Framework image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

percentage.description: Set if the values for the memory are in percentages

minimum.description: Sets the initial size of the heap that will be used by the Frank!Framework

maximum.description: Sets the maximum size of the heap that will be used by the Frank!Framework

side.description: Set the `DTAP` side of where the instance is running

secret.description: Set the secret name of the existing secret

key.description: Set the key inside the secret that contains the data (e.g. `credentials.properties`)

name.description: Set the name of the Frank! instance (default is the `fullname`)

names.description: Set the configurations to load. Leave empty to use the default

certificateStores.description: Define certificate (key/trust) stores to mount in the resources folder of the Frank!

authentication.description: Set http authentication for the Frank!

localUsers.description: Set localUsers who can log in on the Frank!

localUsersExistingSecret.description: The name of the existing secret, containing the 'tomcat-users.xml' and 'localUsers.yml' files.

baseDn.description: Set baseDn for Active Directory users

transactionManager.description: Set the transaction manager for Tomcat. Options: `NARAYANA`, `BTM`, ``

javaOpts.description: Append custom options to the `JAVA_OPTS` environment variable for the Frank!

create.description: Create a `context.xml` and possibly overwrite the existing one, to configure the connections/resources.

jdbc.description: Set multiple database connections. One connection should have an empty name, so it'll get picked up by default (unless `jdbc.required=false` is set)

replicaCount.description: Number of Frank!Framework replicas to deploy

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Frank!

className.description: IngressClass that will be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Define tls secrets for hosts (implementation not done yet)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which pods are forcefully killed

timeZone.description: used for database connection and log timestamps

create.description: Enable creation of ServiceAccount for Frank!Framework pod

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for the ServiceAccount

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

enabled.description: Enable persistence using Persistent Volume Claims

existingClaim.description: The name of an existing PVC to use for persistence

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume for the Frank!Framework's data PVC

timezone.description: The timezone of the receiving zds service

endpoint.description: Set the endpoint the service should be available at

validationSoftFail.description: Incoming messages are validated, if set to `true` the message still gets processed if it fails

endpoint.description: Set the endpoint the service should be available at

validationSoftFail.description: Incoming messages are validated, if set to `true` the message still gets processed if it fails

authType.description: Options: 'jwt', 'basic', 'value'. 'value' uses the password field of the given authAlias as Authorization header.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties'.

timeout.description: Set timeout for the zaken API.

verifyHostname.description: If 'true', the hostname in the certificate will be checked against the actual hostname of the Zaken API.

allowSelfSignedCertificates.description: If true, self signed certificates are accepted.

disableCookies.description: Disables the use of cookies, making the calls to zaken API completely stateless.

uri.description: Resource URL to truststore to be used for authenticating Zaken API. If none specified, the JVMs default truststore will be used.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties' used to obtain the truststore password.

authType.description: Options: 'jwt', 'basic', 'value'. 'value' uses the password field of the given authAlias as Authorization header.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties'.

timeout.description: Set timeout for the catalogi API.

verifyHostname.description: If 'true', the hostname in the certificate will be checked against the actual hostname of the catalogi API.

allowSelfSignedCertificates.description: If true, self signed certificates are accepted.

disableCookies.description: Disables the use of cookies, making the calls to catalogi API completely stateless.

uri.description: Resource URL to truststore to be used for authenticating catalogi API. If none specified, the JVMs default truststore will be used.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties' used to obtain the truststore password.

verifyHostname.description: If 'true', the hostname in the certificate will be checked against the actual hostname of the documenten API.

allowSelfSignedCertificates.description: If true, self signed certificates are accepted.

disableCookies.description: Disables the use of cookies, making the calls to documenten API completely stateless.

uri.description: Resource URL to truststore to be used for authenticating documenten API. If none specified, the JVMs default truststore will be used.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties' used to obtain the truststore password.

verifyHostname.description: If 'true', the hostname in the certificate will be checked against the actual hostname of the besluiten API.

allowSelfSignedCertificates.description: If true, self signed certificates are accepted.

disableCookies.description: Disables the use of cookies, making the calls to besluiten API completely stateless.

uri.description: Resource URL to truststore to be used for authenticating besluiten API. If none specified, the JVMs default truststore will be used.

authAlias.description: Reference to an auth alias configured in 'credentials.properties' used to obtain the truststore password.

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Frank!

className.description: IngressClass that will be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Define tls secrets for hosts (implementation not done yet)

nameOverride.description: String to partially override zaakbrug.apiProxyFullname template (will maintain the release name)

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override zaakbrug.apiProxyFullname template

replicaCount.description: Number of API proxy replicas to deploy

podLabels.description: Extra labels for API proxy pods

tag.description: API proxy image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

existingConfigmap.description: Set the name of an existing config-map to use as configuration for the API proxy

annotations.description: Annotations for the API proxy service

rootUrl.description: Endpoint of the zaken API of the staging zaaksysteem
Endpoint of the documenten API of the staging zaaksysteem
Endpoint of the catalogi API of the staging zaaksysteem
Endpoint of the besluiten API of the staging zaaksysteem

debug.description: Set the debug mode of the zaaksysteem

allowedHosts.description: Set the (v)hosts that need to be accessible for OpenZaak

secretKey.description: Secret key thats used for certain cryptographic utilities. Use [Djecrety](https://djecrety.ir/) to generate one

username.description: User to log in to the database

enabled.description: Toggle persistence for the staging zaaksysteem

storageClassName.description: Configure which storage class should be used
